Draft Rating:

D

Chris Wallace ranks in the 32th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Wallace's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 6 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Josh Selby with 49th pick but was worth 27th pick.
  • Drafted DeMarre Carroll with 27th pick but was worth 17th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Hasheem Thabeet with 2th pick but was worth 33th pick.
  • Drafted Jaren Jackson Jr. with 4th pick but was worth 10th pick.
  • Drafted Xavier Henry with 12th pick but was worth 46th pick.

Trade Rating:

C-

Chris Wallace ranks in the 43th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Tony Delk, Rodney Rogers to BOS.
  • Lost Randy Brown, Joe Johnson, Milt Palacio, Casey Jacobsen to PHO.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Greg Buckner, Marko Jarić, O.J. Mayo, Antoine Walker to MEM.
  • Lost Brian Cardinal, Jason Collins, Kevin Love, Mike Miller to MIN.

Signing Rating:

B

Chris Wallace ranks in the 68th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Mike Conley in 2010.
  • Signed Marc Gasol in 2015.
  • Signed Mike Conley in 2016.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Dillon Brooks in 2017.
  • Signed Darko Miličić in 2007.
  • Signed Andrew Harrison in 2016.
